name: First My Family All-in-One 2-Person 72-Hour Survival Kit
description: A compact, FEMA-compliant kit designed to support two people for 72 hours, including essentials like food, water, and first aid.

name: Blue Seventy-Two 72-Hour Emergency Backpack Survival Kit
description: A lightweight, grab-and-go backpack equipped with essential items for one person to survive emergencies for three days.

name: Taiker 151-Piece Emergency Survival Kit with First Aid
description: An extensive survival kit combining emergency tools, medical supplies, and fishing gear, all packed in a durable backpack.
